oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ON EXISTENCE OF INVARIANT MEASURES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: AITHAL, VT
KULKARNI, RS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Invariant measures
homogeneous spaces
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Let G be a Lie group, H <= G a closed subgroup and M approximate to G/H. In [14] Andre Weil gave a necessary and sufficient condition for the existence of invariant measures on homogeneous spaces of arbitrary locally compact groups. For Lie groups using the structure theory we give a neater necessary and sufficient condition for the existence of a G-invariant measure on M, cf. Theorems (2.1) and (3.2) in the introduction.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF PURE & APPLIED MATHEMATICS, 43(4)343-358
